data.title: AP Chemistry Help
data.meta_description: Free AP Chemistry resources organized by general topics. Each concept includes free example questions with detailed solutions.
data.text:
Varsity Tutors’ Learning Tools AP Chemistry Learn by Concept resource is a free interactive online syllabus that provides you with the tools you need to review for the AP exam. Learn by Concept is presented in an intuitive, easy-to-use format, and can be a great addition to your studying tool belt. Whether you need top Chemistry tutors in Richmond, Chemistry tutors in Tulsa, or top Chemistry tutors in San Diego, working with a pro may take your studies to the next level.

AP-level classes are a great option for high school students who are looking to differentiate themselves from their peers during the college application process. However, the end of the year exams in classes like AP Chemistry can be challenging. You may find the Learn by Concept resource convenient, as it can be accessed anywhere because it is entirely online. That means wherever you are, you’ll have free AP Chemistry study material easily accessible to you. In addition to the AP Chemistry Help Section and AP Chemistry tutoring, you may also want to consider taking some of our AP Chemistry Practice Tests.

Varsity Tutors’ Learning Tools Learn by Concept offers AP Chemistry study help in a unique format, and includes a variety of sample questions and explanations. Learn by Concept provides a comprehensive list of the topics you’ll need to study and many concept-specific questions, so you can see how those topics and ideas will be translated into questions. This will give you a window of insight which may be very helpful as you customize your review. You can go through the syllabus and answer the questions for yourself, then compare them to the attached explanations. In doing this, you’ll get a good idea of how you are progressing in your AP Chemistry review.

Some of the more popular topics you can expect to find covered by the AP Chemistry Learn by Concept resource include:

- Compounds and Molecules

- Elements and Atoms

- Laboratory Techniques and Analysis

- Reactions and Equilibrium

- Solutions and States of Matter

- Thermochemistry and Kinetics

- Stoichiometry

- And many others.

In addition to the interactive AP Chemistry Learn by Concept resource, Varsity Tutors’ Learning Tools also offer a variety of other products to help assist in every phase of the studying process. You can find Full-Length Practice Tests and concept-specific Practice Tests and a Question of the Day to help you learn the material. You might find it helpful to start by going over the comprehensive Learn by Concept resource, and then taking a Practice Test upon completion. The results will give you an idea of where you’re at with your AP Chemistry review, and will let you know which concepts you may want to drill with the Flashcards. Additionally, you can use the Full-Length Practice Tests to simulate what the real AP exam may be like. The Question of the Day offers you a sample question from one of these Learning Tools each day, so that you can remain fresh in your knowledge of all of the concepts discussed. Varsity Tutors also offers resources like a free AP Chemistry Flashcards help with your self-paced study, or you may want to consider an AP Chemistry tutor.

Varsity Tutors’ Learning Tools offer users of all skill levels a variety of useful study material. The free AP Chemistry practice can be used to help make studying for the exam more convenient. With Learning Tools like these, you’ll have no shortage of material in your preparation for the AP Chemistry exam.
